Name: Family stela
Description: This funerary monument of the New Kingdom is distinguished by several scenes divided into three registers. In the first register, the Master of Stables Merire, accompanied by his wife and one of his sons, presents some offerings to Osiris, who sits on a throne. In the second register, one sees another son making a libation in front of his parents. The third register is occupied by five other sons and a daughter, kneeling down before an offering table. At the bottom of the stela, two lines of text contain a short offering formula
